name: Xmas Lights
description:
Xmas Lights, the game. A simple point&click game where the objective is to turn on the xmas lights. 

This game was made by IG Vald, aka manarkisan, for the Game Makers Iceland's 2022 game jam. The theme is "Lights".  Made in Unity with  Adventure Creator, Krita for visual assets.

No matter how hard I tried, I couldn't make the game playable in browser :'(

Sound credits:

Background music: "Inspiration", written by Rafael Krux (from freepd.com)

Click sound: "Switch ON - Livingroom.wav", from MastersDisaster on freesound.org

Xmas sound: "Toy xzylaphone music jingle Bells", from JohnsonBrandEditing on freesound.org
